** BELLSOUTH TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC. **
561 832 4117 908
APR 05 2005 R
WPB PAGE 4 BST
CURRENT CHARGES
ITEM CODES AMOUNT
fourdigit Personal Identification Number (PIN) shown by "Question? Call:" on the first page of your BellSouth bill, or the last four digits of the social security number associated with your telephone account. By providing your bank account information and PIN or social security number, you are authorizing BellSouth and your bank or financial institution to process a one-time debit from your bank account for payment of your BellSouth bill. Bill payment options are also available on our Website at bellsouth.com. Thank you for choosing BellSouth for your communications needs.
Visit us on the Internet: www.bellsouth.com
07/26/17 Page 27 of 104 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031644
